item.title: Publications and Projects
item.description: Paper Lemoto, E., Liu, L., Wang, Q., Halabi S., Hong, H. (2024). Bayesian Bias-Adjustment of Network Meta-Analysis of COVID-19 Trials, *to be submitted * Hong H., Halabi, S., Lu, L., Lemoto, E., Turner, N. A comparison of network meta- analysis of COVID-19 trials with the COVID-19 guideline: Can a network meta-analysis inform clinical decision-makers guidelines on the treatment of patients with COVID-19? In preparation. Hong H., Lu, L., Lemoto, E.
